mapper.update: INSERT INTO "uploaded_image" ( id, width, height, file_size, file_path, file_type, file_hash, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{width}, #{height}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileHash}, #{status}::image_status, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "generated_image" ( id, image_id, configuration_id, width, height, file_size, file_path, file_type, file_hash, created_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{imageId}, #{configurationId}, #{width}, #{height}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileHash}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE "processing_job" SET remark = #{remark}, ended_at = #{endedAt}, job_status = #{jobStatus}::job_status WHERE id = #{jobId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "processing_job" ( id, image_id, configuration_id, job_status, started_at, ended_at, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{imageId}, #{configurationId}, #{jobStatus}::job_status, #{startedAt}, #{endedAt}, #{remark} )
